propositions.text: 我知道你们都是一群非常有爱心的人，我一直都知道，你们总是会帮助我，支持我，
但是我不能总是依靠你们，

main_topics: Statement of Self-Reliance and Future Aspirations
hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a direct address and a series of questions, followed by an acknowledgment of the audience's support. The core of the text is a strong, repetitive assertion of the speaker's need for self-reliance and personal growth across various domains.
